## compare() function

Compare the first value to the second using the provided operator.

If no operator is provided it defaults to "==="


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function compare(value1: Comparable, value2: Comparable, operator?: MatchOperation): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value1 | [Comparable](./stentor-utils.comparable.md) |  |
|  value2 | [Comparable](./stentor-utils.comparable.md) |  |
|  operator | [MatchOperation](./stentor-models.matchoperation.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
